name: A Nerd's Delay
description:
Our protagonist Otakun is a big fan of manga, idols and video games. But his mom doesn't accept his passion and keeps pursuing him into finishing school, finding a job and doing other normie activities!

Otakun doesn't want to start that kind of life! But deep in his heart, he knows he can't escape forever...

The game works best in Chrome/Chromium.

Controls:

Arrows/WASD - move

Shift/Space - spin attack (get 5 Nerd Items to get 1 spin attack)

M - mute music

Otakun's design is based on a Virtual Youtuber Itakage Kuon

https://twitter.com/ItakageKuon

Music by DOVA-SYNDROME

Sound by: https://chrislsound.itch.io/sci-fi-sfx-pack

Font: https://www.fontspace.com/a-art-paper-font-f50754

Changelog, done after submission: 

- fixed a one line bug which allowed to send score multiple times to leaderboard
